thread.title: Clean, hotel gem in an ideal location!
thread.title_full: Clean, hotel gem in an ideal location! - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kfal8383
title: Clean, hotel gem in an ideal location!
text: Very clean, idea location and no detail overlooked at the Archer Hotel. I was impressed from the moment I arrived to the time I departed. I have to say the hotel cleanliness and attention to detail were what impressed me most. Ideal location in midtown that was far enough away from the craziness of Times Square yet close enough for a quick walk to get there at the same time. Friendly staff and fabulous views at the rooftop bar as well!
